bug.author: akash123mandal
bug.summary: Wrong description in Digit classifier : Tensorflow Lite examples
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL with the issue: https://www.tensorflow.org/lite/examples</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue:</denchmark-h>
The digit classifier example card has the wrong description : "Generate reply suggestions to input conversational chat messages." <denchmark-h:h2>Screenshot</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23613193/80188049-4441c500-862e-11ea-998d-b66c246de3d2.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Thanks. Filed an internal issue: b/154952252
This has been fixed now. Thanks!
